metadata.title: CVE-2021-47037 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: ASoC:q6afe-clocks: fix reprobing of the driver Q6afe-clocks driver can getreprobed. For example if the APR services are restarted after the firmwarecrash. However currently Q6afe-clocks driver will oops because hw.init willget cleared during first _probe call. Rewrite the driver to fill the clockdata at runtime rather than using big static array of clocks.
